comments:
If there are fragments in the target platform, but not a cooresponding plugin,
you get a NPE if trying to build an ANT build.xml, even if that fragment is not
involved in the one being built. 

The problem is that the following:
PluginDescriptorModel plugin = registry.getPlugin(pluginId); (line 788)

returns null for plugin since it doesn't exist. The next line assumes it is there.

Because of this condition you can't build any build.xml's. You need to go to the
Preferences->Build Target-> and uncheck those fragments. This is a workaround,
but it is hard to figure out. I needed to go and actually debug the code before
I figured out what was going on.

Here is the stack trace:

I just verified that this had been fixed for 3.0M2.
